text: Tin Pan Alley is a 1940 American romantic musical drama movie directed by Walter Lang and starring Alice Faye, Betty Grable, Jack Oakie, John Payne, Allen Jenkins, Fayard Nicholas, Harold Nicholas, Elisha Cook Jr.. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and won an Academy Award in 1941.Green, Stanley (1999) Hollywood Musicals Year by Year (2nd ed.), pub. title: Tin Pan Alley (movie)
